item.title: NiceFart.io
item.description:
Our first game! NiceFart.io is online multiplayer game available for Browsers, Android and iOS. As a webgame you don’t need to download anything to play it just go to nicefart.io and play it!.

In this game, you’re a small and funny butt, who must eat beans to grow and become the biggest ass in the game. But will be not easy, other players don’t have mercy for a weak butt, so you need to use your super powers like farts, run faster, or shoot deadly farts to beat other players!

Play it:

  • Web: http://nicefart.io
  • iOS: Soon…
  • Android: Soon…

–

  • Artist: Rubén del Castillo
  • Development & Design: Nazarí González

item.title: Released our first game: NiceFart.io
item.description:
We’re so happy today because our first game is online now!
NiceFart.io is a online multiplayer game for browsers based in a hilarious world where the players are butts trying to beat other players eating beans, and shooting farts.

This game is similar to agar.io or slither.io, games where your goal is eat and become the biggest player. For now, the game is available for browser, but we’re working hard to have soon versions for Android and iOS.

We made NiceFart.io with love, and we hope you enjoy it!

More information on our NiceFart.io section.

Play NiceFart.io

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Hello! This is our first post. Welcome to our site, it’s a really minimalistic site, we know! But, we think the most important thing for a game studio are their games.

We are so close to launch our very first title, an online multiplayer game for browser, Android and Iphone. Please, follow us on Twitter and Facebook to keep updated!

Let the games speak for themselves!

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact with us on Twitter, Facebook or sending us an Email.

item.title: Home
item.description: Hello! We are Tarentola Digital, a small indie game studio based on the Canary Islands. We are specialist making multiplayer browser games, but also we make cross platform games.
